org.apache.tephra.persist

Class AbstractTransactionStateStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • org.apache.tephra.persist.AbstractTransactionStateStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, TransactionStateStorage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HDFSTransactionStateStorage, LocalFileTransactionStateStorage

    public abstract class AbstractTransactionStateStorage
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements TransactionStateStorage
    Common base class for all transaction storage implementations. This implement logic to prefix a snapshot with a version when encoding, and to select the correct codec for decoding based on this version prefix.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
